item.title: Is it posible to recolor a custom item? rep++
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

hey this idea recently came to me and i realy wanted to see if its posible. my server has custom wings (not made by me) and i was wondering is i could recolour them without using mesquoia or any modeling program. like can you recolour lie original rs items?
this is the int for it. let me know plox rep++

if(i == 12123){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 128; class8.anInt174 = 14306; //model class8.anInt181 = 1250; class8.anInt190 = 136; class8.anInt198 = 1936; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.anInt175 = 0; class8.anInt197 = 0; class8.anInt199 = 0; class8.anInt165 = 14307; //model class8.anInt200 = 14307; //model class8.aString170 = "Purple Wings"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Wings given by the unknowns.".getBytes(); }

thanks in adv

Read full topic
